text: mas    Treatment of glioblastomas may include the following:             -  Surgery followed by radiation therapy and chemotherapy given at the same time, followed by chemotherapy alone.      - Surgery followed by radiation therapy.     - Chemotherapy placed into the brain during surgery.     - Radiation therapy and chemotherapy given at the same time.     - A clinical trial of a new treatment added to standard treatment.
